data.message: I LOVE THE NEW BUTTONS BUT WHERE IS THE DISLIKE BUTTON

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Ladean. Posts on Facebook cover a variety of emotions with updates that are happy, sad, funny, painful, and thought-provoking. We've received feedback that people would like to react to these posts in different ways and Reactions will help people do that. -Rey
I know and I said I love them🙂
Facebook but where is the dislike B
They won't answer you cause they don't have an answer.... Where is the dislike button Facebook?
A dislike button serves an important purpose too.  Where's that dislike button?  We were told that it was coming before all these others.
Facebook you did not answer the question "where is the dislike button?" You now sound like the GOP debates!
Imagine someone disliking selfies though 😱 or updates like "in a relationship" or "engaged"
Paloma Bollinger or laughing at it or angry at it??
You can use the "angry" one to indicate a dislike....just a suggestion.  :)
I can't get anything?
Ginger Jourdenais Yes, but some of us would like to dislike something without assigning an emotion to it.
David Courtney I feel the same way
Me encantan todos!!!
Just a thumbs down would work
David Courtney, dislike has an emotion assigned to it 😊

They did a test and got feedback that the dislike button would be a negative thing. They don't want to support bullying on the Internet , not to mention disliking products on Facebook is bad for business . Never gonna happen .
Nejla Kajtezovic then why the angry button. That's not negative?
Kabita Grg I suppose, but a thumbs down is less negative than a red angry face.
Why do you need a dislike button if you don't like it move on.

Facebook really needs to review the feedback and give us a thumbs down choice. Thank you. Sometimes I see a rude or offensive post and just want to hit thumbs down. Why isn't Facebook giving us what we want! 👎
Angry emotion or Sad emotion= Dislike buttons 🙂

Oksana Tarnavsky I donno, wouldn't a "dislike"  button be a negative, slightly nasty, maybe even bullying button?  Did you ever learn "if you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all?"  It's the best philosophy ...
I'm not sure these work. I'm trying and nothing. So how do u make it work? I've held the button down and it just unlikes it instead of giving me all these options? Please help
I just hold the like button down and it brings it sell up. Maybe depends on how old your phone is??
Why is a "dislike" BUTTON so important? Get over yourselves and grow up 😡😡😡😡😡😡😝😜
